runs.comm: all action start, Sidebottom lands it on about half way down, good line, Watson pulls off the front foot, without much timing towards the deep midwicket boundary for a couple
good adjustment from Sidebottom, pitches up, hint of swing into the batsman, Watson rocks forward and defends

gone! Sidebottom strikes! Watson flashes at a short and widish ball, flies off the top edge to Kieswetter, who can't quite hold on, bounces off his gloves and Swann takes the rebound! Massive breakthrough for England.
poor start from Sidebottom to Clarke, well down the leg side and a gentle wide
gets his line better this time, fuller and on middle, Clarke flicks it round the corner to fine leg to get off the mark
dug in and angled towards Warner's body, he hops back and works it to square leg for a single
another one shoved in down the leg side, Clarke attempted to fiddle it away, but misses and it's another wide
good finish to the over, full and straight, Clarke defends back to the bowler, who fields in his follow through
good start from Bresnan, nippy and bang on a length and line, Warner skipped back and tried to force it on to the leg side, but it was on him too quickly
Warner itching to get things going, giving himself a touch of room and looking to scythe this through the off side, it gets a touch big on him and he can't time it
Warner hangs on the back foot and pulls this, from a fullish length really, through square leg for a single
Bresnan really holding his nerve here, banging it in just short of a length on a good line, and Clarke defends

Warner gone this time! England on fire, Clarke pushes a good-length ball to cover, and then attempts a single, Warner tares down but Lumb swooped in and under-armed his throw on to the stumps at the strikers end to leave Warner well short of his ground
oh dear, indecision again from Clarke, Haddin guided it to short third man and Clarke called a very close single, this time though, the throw missed the stumps. High drama and nerves already!

Sidebottom strikes again! Australia lose another wicket! Short and down the leg side from Sidebottom, hardly a great ball, but Haddin swung hard at it and it came off what looks like the thigh, Kieswetter took an excellent catch high to his left. Great catch but very unlucky for Haddin
very carefully played this by David Hussey, it was on a length and aimed around off stump, Hussey watches it on to the bat and guides it down to third man for a single
dug in shortish again, not many pitched up, but the pitch is zipping through, and Clarke nurdles it down to short fine leg for a quick single
excellent stuff, swinging in a touch, bang on off and middle, Hussey defends very carefully from the crease
good again from Sidebottom, fuller this time, and finding enough swing into the batsman to bring caution, Hussey pushes to the covers where Lumb races in to field
beaten! Real nip of the pitch here, climbing off a decent length outside off and rushing past the edge of Hussey's hanging bat
starts well enough, fullish and on off stump, Clarke very positively strides into the ball and drives firmly to cover
shorter this time, angled into the body, Clarke turns it to midwicket easily enough for a calm single
short again from Broad, clear plan by the looks of things, Hussey gets deep into his crease, rides the bounce and drops the ball into the off side and collects a sharp single
very nicely played by Clarke here, another shortish ball and he was waiting on the back foot and picked a gap in front of midwicket to push for a couple
this was a real short ball, zipped over the crouching Clarke, given a wide. Predictably, Broad moans a touch, but it seemed fair enough
lucky this for Broad. Dug in short, Clarke pulls but picks out the one fielder - short fine leg

oh dear! Push and go again from Clarke and almost trouble. Clarke called Hussey through for a single that wasn't there, Lumb ran in from cover and once again flicked an under-arm throw, this time though, he missed the stumps. Would have been out
well, finally, the first four of the match, short and into Clarke's body, this is a bit of a gimme, he turns away behind him for an easy boundary
better ball this time, on and around off stump, Clarke stands tall and pushes towards point for an easy single
Hussey hanging on his back foot, no need to get forward at all here, and this shortish ball is tickled to short fine leg for a single
good line from Sidebottom, back of a length, but just outside off, Clarke guides it to point
good carry from a decent length, arrowed into Clarke's hip, he flicks airily down to deep square for a single
top finish to the over, bang on a length and line, Hussey can only push gently to the cover fielder
good cricket all round here, good length on off stump, Clarke pushes to mid off and collects a sharp single
Hussey looking for something here, edging leg side and trying to upper-cut for a boundary, good plan given the length England are bowling, but it zips past the top edge
nothing fancy this time from Hussey, carefully defending off the back foot
good intent from Broad, really sprinting in and banging the ball in short of a good length, Hussey skips back and defends
pressure building here, Hussey again looking to manufacture something, edging leg side of the ball and trying to guide it  away, but can't pierce the field
Hussey skips leg side and smites, but straight to cover
Bresnan back into the attack, Clarke greets him with a nurdle to leg side for one
Hussey can't quite find his range at the moment, this was arrowed down the leg side, but he couldn't get the flick away and it comes off the pads for a leg bye
angled too far down leg this time, Clarke carefully pulls it down to a sliding deep square fielder who keeps it to a couple
good ball this, back of a length and Clarke stands tall and pushes towards point for a single
Hussey looking to create some momentum, gets on the back foot and swipes, with no timing, down to mid on for a single
not a great ball this and Clarke punishes him, short but slower, sits up for Clarke who pulls past mid on for the second boundary of the innings
tentative start from Swann, flat and quick on off stump, Hussey cuts to deep point for a single
pitched up this time, Clarke comes down the wicket and guides to long on for one
nicely bowled, slower and outside off stump, Hussey stretches forward and guides to long off
flighted a touch again, Clarke drives firmly back to Swann who fields
nicely played by Clarke here, came down the wicket and opened the face to pick the gap in the covers and collect one
Swann finishes the over well, on off stump, Hussey tries to force it through point but can't beat the fielder
actually flighted a touch first up, Clarke carefully flicks it into a gap at midwicket a single
very careful so far from Hussey against spin, works this from off stump to long on for a gentle single
pushed through this time, really quite quickly, Clarke hurries into a back foot defence
touch too much width this time, Clarke is back and cutting in a flash, past point for a couple
Clarke using his feet well, walking up the wicket and turning this to deep midwicket for one
very well bowled, much quicker, it was on to Hussey in an instant and he could only end up inside-edging into to leg side and Clarke calls him through for a well-judged quick single
lovely bowling, flighted up invitingly, Hussey has a swipe but mistimes it to short fine leg for one

brilliant from Collingwood! Fantastic catch! Swann flighted it up, and beat Clarke in the air as he skipped down the wicket, in the end it's chipped into what looked a vacant straight midwicket, but Collingwood dived to his left from short midwicket, two-handed and plucked it out the air
Swann flights it well up to big Cameron White, who pushes down to long on gently
Hussey not doing anything fancy here, carefully pushing this down to long on for one
nicely bowled, fullish and flighted, White can do nothing but defend off the front foot
top over from Swann, finished with a good ball outside off, White stretches forward and defends, getting his eye in before trying anything too expansive
Yardy continues his good work, on and around off stump and pushed into the covers for one
touch more air on this one, White content to push it to long on
too short and enough width on this to allow Hussey to get back and cut firmly through point for a couple
quicker ball, finds a touch of bounce, shovelled down to long on for one
quicker again, and finding good bounce once more, worked to long on for an easy single
carefully worked away from a full length into midwicket for another easy single
quicker ball from Swann, firing it into the pads, worked to the short midwicket fielder
nicely bowled once more from Swann, flight and dip, Hussey chipped it off the leading edge towards Broad, one bounce at long on
well played this, White went leg side of the ball and lifted it over extra cover for a couple
touch of turn here for Swann, spinning in from outside off stump, White helps it on its way for a single to short fine leg
good bowling once more, Hussey can do nothing but work it gently back to the bowler
good over from Swann, spinners doing a good choking job for England, Hussey turns his wrists over the ball and sends it gently to midwicket for one
nicely bowled, quicker on off stump, cut to a diving point fielder
well, finally the shackles are broken! Shorter and Hussey swiped it brilliantly, sending it miles over midwicket for six
back on a length this time, worked away for one
oops, full toss, and to White that is asking for trouble! He butchers it down the ground for four
White is off! Good ball, but White lent back and smacked it over cow corner for a big six again
White is a very powerful man, this has almost a yorker length, yet his still managed to swing his big arms through the ball and send it rocketing down the ground for four. Big big over for Australia
good from Swann, arrowed in at off, Hussey tried to cut but couldn't get it away
fuller this time and driven into the covers for a single
ooh, lovely stuff from Swann, held back a fraction, White thinks about another big shot but defends
White edging down the wicket, Swann teasing him with flight, worked firmly to short midwicket and Collingwood fields
top shot again, White really ticking now. Planted his front foot and smashed through the line, sending it flying flat down straight down the ground for four
good finish to an excellent spell from Swann, touch of air, White clips it firmly back to the bowler
Hussey looking more secure now, picking a gap to third man from this shortish ball outside off
oh dear, don't bowl there if you're Tim Bresnan. Too short but lacking the intent, White hung on his back foot and bludgeoned it through midwicket for four
good response from Bresnan, slightly fuller and giving White no room to swing his arms, defended back to the bowler
banged in short and at the body again, White has no room to cause damage here, and it's worked into the leg side
Hussey skipping leg side of the ball, looking to give himself room, as it was, it was wide off off stump anyway and he can't reach it

all happening here! Hussey top edged a massive swipe, it went miles in the air, swirling around, Broad called it from mid on, but in the end could not even drop it, as he misjudged a huge chance completely. Strong breeze here might have been his undoing
starts well enough, yorker length, outside off stump, jabbed into the off side for one
goodness me, if White did connect on that we would not get the ball back, it was full and in his hitting zone, but he tried to hit it too hard and couldn't time it well enough
good stuff from Wright, holding his nerve and landing his yorker, Hussey slugs it down to long on

White gone this time! Broad takes the catch! Really good from Broad, it was another fullish ball, White had a big swish and it came off the outside edge miles in the air, Broad called for it straight away from point and ran behind him to hold on to an excellent, crucial catch
Luke Wright has done very well here, his length and line unflinching, Hussey shoves it, without much timing down the ground for one
good ball first up to Hussey, and the ice-man coolly works it down to third man for a gentle single. The man has no idea what pressure is it seems!
big big chance here missed by Collingwood. Hussey guided a short ball straight to cover, Collingwood had all three stumps to aim at, but missed
touch of swing into the right hander here, worked away into the leg side for a single
well, Hussey gets away with one here, edging down the track and looking to drive through the covers, it flies off the outside edge wide of the keeper for four
good ball from Bresnan, slower and Hussey guides it down to third man for a calm single
very damaging for England that. Bresnan throws up a high full toss, far too high, no ball, and Hussey swiped it, with the breeze over midwicket for six
this time it's worked firmly down to deep midwicket for a couple, good over this for Australia
tidy finish from Bresnan, finding a fullish length, Hussey swings hard but it comes off the bottom edge towards the keeper for another single
arrowed into the body, as Hussey runs leg side of the ball and looks to cut towards third man, but he has no room to free his arms and guides it away for one to third man
lovely shot from M.Hussey, really top stuff, picked the gap bang on square leg, and flicked a fullish ball straight to the boundary
Broad ensuring Hussey can't repeat the shot by shoving this full and well outside off, Hussey can only squirt it down to third man for one
David Hussey this time picking the gaps, very nicely done, saw the man up at fine leg, so Hussey ran off side of the ball, and flicked it, up on one leg, over the fielder for four
D Hussey may have found his range now, edging down the wicket and slugging this firmly down the ground, Pietersen runs back from mid off, slides and stops it short of the boundary
good fielding again from Pietersen on the boundary, Hussey repeated the shot and timed it better, Pietersen off in a flash and sliding and stopping it just short of the long on boundary
Sidebottom backs his slower-ball bouncer, landing it first ball back, Hussey waits, and waits, and swats it down to midwicket for a single
nicely played, D Hussey collects fifty of 49 balls, chipping this fullish ball down the ground for a well-run couple
Hussey goes leg side of the ball, Sidebottom angled it well wide of off, and it's a fine call, but not a wide
very unlucky that for the bowler, Hussey down the track and leg side of the ball again, Sidebottom fired it wide of him, but Hussey reached well enough to outside edge it wide of the keeper for four
another fullish ball outside off, Hussey reaching for it once more and flaying it over cover for two more, hard running for these two
this time it will be a wide, Hussey looking to edge leg side of the ball and swing through cover, Sidebottom shoving it outside off, but too far for the umpire
good ball to finish a decent Sidebottom over, full and straight, D Hussey crashed it back down the ground firmly for another couple
Broad will be happy enough with that, full and Hussey swung it hard but straight down to the deep midwicket fielder

very good again from Broad, full and straight, not giving much for Hussey to work with, he shoves it down to long on, Wright fields, and fires in a throw to the strikers end where Hussey is attempting to come back for the second, Kieswetter takes it in front of the stumps and has the bails off in a flash, beating the batsman, top fielding that!
very good thinking from Broad, much slower ball, Smith swishes at thin air long before the ball arrives, Hussey runs through for a bye before Kieswetter can get the throw back
full and wide of off stump, Hussey can't do much more than shove it down to long on, where the throw comes back like a rocket and keeps it to one
lovely slower ball from Broad, once again defeating Smith's mow across the line, Hussey  runs the bye
top finish from Broad, full and outside off, Hussey drives down to long off once more, Wright fumbles, much to Broad's vocal annoyance, and allows Hussey to come back for the second
